name: Gizmo (itch) (themousery)
description:
made for Weekly Game Jam #104 - theme: "Fix It"

Gizmo is a short prototype game about fixing a machine. You have to memorize where the parts go, and put them in their correct places from memory.

Credits:

Progamming - themousery

Sound Effects - https://www.bfxr.net/

Made with LÖVE

Music from https://filmmusic.io
